author: Angela Watercutter
title: HBO and AMC Are Offering Free Streams for Folks Stuck Inside
description: Coronavirus stay-at-home orders mean a lot of people are indoors watching movies and TV. Now some networks are giving their wares away for free.
content: Hello, and welcome to this Monday's edition of The Monitor, WIREDs entertainment news roundup. Today we've got some news about Jay-Z and Meek Mill, a surprising second act for the South by Southwest film festival, and some free content from HBO and AMC. Let's… [+3238 chars]
